system.requirements:
Tier 2; BS 35, Weapon Training (SP)
Aptitudes: Ballistic Skill, Finesse
system.effect:
When Character clears a Jam from a Solid Projectile Weapon, they may also reload it as a Free Action as part of the Action to unjam it.
Additionally, clearing a Jam only loses one round from the weapon's current clip, instead of the entire clip.

description.value: When Character clears a Jam from a Solid Projectile Weapon, they may also reload it as a Free Action as part of the Action to unjam it. Additionally, clearing a Jam only loses one round from the weapon's current clip, instead of the entire clip.
